ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.123: Morocco, off Cape Hadid; 31°58'N 09°54'W; depth 89 m, sandy clay; van Veen grab; 25.iii.1976

CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.153: Azores, E of Flores; 39°26'N 31°06'W; depth 150-168 m, Chama bed with fossil shells; rectangulare dredge; 9.vi.1981
